```{r}
library(dataRetrieval)

```

```{r}
# Ventura River
siteNumber <- "11118500"
parameterCd <- "00060" # Discharge
startDate <- "2023-08-19"
endDate <- "2023-08-22"

discharge <- readNWISdv(siteNumber, parameterCd, startDate, endDate)
```

```{r}
discharge_plot<- ggplot(data = discharge, aes(x = Date, y = X_00060_00003)) +
  geom_line()
discharge_plot
```
